column5: http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=26502  A while back Brandon, who takes some wonderful pictures and post them in the photography section. On this occasion he was at a few Windsor Spitfires game of the Ontario Hockey league, and took some great action shots of the team and their new arena.  So I did my little post, and gave a heads up........... "See you in the playoffs...."  Well sure enough my Brampton Battalion took out Belleville in a hard fought 6 game series to take the Eastern Crown.  Windsor handled London in 5 games to take the Western Conference.  So they will meet for all the marbles!  http://www.ontariohockeyleague.com/spitfir...-series-p128240  My second favorite OHL team "Whoever is playing London"!  Thanks Windsor, honored to cheer against ya!  OK that's me tooting my horn!!!!!!  Go Troops Go!  Oh and I took in the Crappie opener on Pigeon Lake Saturday......the days best.... No measurement or anything but it sure was yummy!
We never had to play our nemesis Colts this playoff either!  Took us out the last two years.
In fashion,I must say.LOL All in fun friend.
gonna be a good series.....bummer im not still in windsor to see the games.....regardless it should make for some good OHL hockey

Should be a good series. Both teams have some young stars and some strong leaders.  To be a true Cherry moment you'll have to bring it up ever month for the next 30 years because you don't have anything original to say.
